subject: Football
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Brain
lead_paragraph: Repeated blows to the head of the N.F.L. guard Ralph Wenzel led to the dementia that he developed later in life. His wife, Eleanor Perfetto, watched the downward spiral that led to his death.
snippet: Repeated blows to the head of the N.F.L. guard Ralph Wenzel led to the dementia that he developed later in life. His wife, Eleanor Perfetto, watched the downward spiral that led to his death.
